trans-unit.source: Provides change monitoring for SQL Server databases.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce il monitoraggio delle modifiche per i database di SQL Server.
Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The SqlChangeMonitor class wraps the ADO.NET <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> class and adds change monitoring for SQL Server-based dependencies.
trans-unit.target: La classe SqlChangeMonitor esegue il wrapping di ADO.NET <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>classe e aggiunge il monitoraggio delle modifiche per le dipendenze basate su SQL Server.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the SqlChangeMonitor class serves as a bridge between the ADO.NET <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> object and the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, la classe SqlChangeMonitor funge da ponte tra ADO.NET <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>oggetto e <xref:System.Runtime.Caching>dello spazio dei nomi.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The SqlChangeMonitor method binds the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange> event of the object in `dependency` to the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ChangeMonitor.OnChanged%2A> method handler.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo SqlChangeMonitor associa il <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange>evento dell'oggetto in `dependency` per il <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ChangeMonitor.OnChanged%2A>gestore del metodo.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ChangeMonitor.OnChanged%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange>

trans-unit.source: This enables the change monitor to receive notification of changes in SQL Server databases.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo il monitoraggio delle modifiche ricevere la notifica delle modifiche nel database di SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: When you invoke the SqlChangeMonitor constructor, you must pass a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando si richiama il costruttore SqlChangeMonitor, è necessario passare un <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>oggetto come parametro.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> object, you must pass a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> parameter to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>dell'oggetto, è necessario passare un <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>parametro al costruttore.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>

trans-unit.source: The constructor for <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> class lets you specify optional information for configuring the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> instance.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore per <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>classe consente di specificare informazioni facoltative per la configurazione di <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>istanza.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents an ADO.NET <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che rappresenta un ADO.NET <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets an identifier for a <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un identificatore per un <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor> class generates a GUID for this property.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor>classe genera un GUID di questa proprietà.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor>

trans-unit.source: An identifier for the change monitor.
trans-unit.target: Un identificatore per il monitoraggio delle modifiche.
